thread.title: Director goes missing at this music launch
thread.title_full: Director goes missing at this music launch - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Director goes missing at this music launch
text:
The recent music launch ceremony of 'Rajwade and Sons' in Mumbai was a glamorous affair but director Sachin Kundalkar gave the event a miss, according to a website.
"Interestingly, the director of the film Kundalkar was not able to attend this event. Due to heavy rains, he was not able to finish some of his shooting. He apologized through social media and commented, "We have shot this film like a strict military schedule. The songs are very simple and easy to hum. The film reflects the current society and hence every member of the audience will be able to identify with this film", "according to marathistars.com.
The film is directed by Sachin Kundalkar, who has earlier given hits like 'Gandh' and 'Happy Journey'. The music for this film has by Debarpito, Andrian Desouza and Tejas Modak while lyrics are penned by Tejas Modak.
READ: Digital poster of Rajwade and Sons
For the music launch event, producer Yashwant Deosthali, Atul Kulkarni, Mrunal Kulkarni, Sachin Khedekar, Satish Alekar, Jyoti Subhash, Paurnima Manohar, Rahul Mehendale, Siddharth Menon, Alok Rajwade, Mrinmayee Godbole, Krutika Dev,, Suhani Dhadfale were present.
Along with these celebrities, singers like Nayantara Bhatkal, Debarpito, Teajas Modak were present. Debarpito and Nayantara rendered some songs from the film.
The film showcases story of three generations from a family. The story of the film is based on a Pune based entrepreneurial family encompassing three generations.
WATCH: Interview with music team of the movie
